item.title: Mapping Census Data Tutorial
item.description: Mapping ACS Data Leaflet is one of my favorite packages. The color choice brings me an unreasonable amount of joy, as do the slightly translucent city and street names. Itâ€™s a gorgeous design that makes maps look sleek and modern. Luckily, there is a great, easy to follow, straight forward tutorial here. I started with a straight forward project and used ACS table B22002 to map the number of household foodstamp use in every tract in Utah.
